purpose: To provide a curated list of resources for financial time series forecasting, aiding researchers and practitioners in the field.
principle: Aggregates and organizes a wide range of academic papers and code repositories related to financial time series forecasting techniques.
reusability: Serves as a reference for researchers and developers looking for state-of-the-art techniques and implementations in financial time series forecasting.
limitations: Primarily a collection of links and references without original implementations; relies on external resources for code and detailed methodologies.
name: awesome-financial-time-series-forecasting
description: Awesome financial time series forecasting papers and codes
highlight: Comprehensive collection of financial time series forecasting resources, including papers and code implementations.
